page.title: 09Clarks and Leisure Activity
page.content: Apart from providing work for many people the{Clark}family have always provided for their workers spare time. In 1885 they built{Crispin hall}in which there was a gym, hall and reading room and is still used for exhibitions, refreshments and many other activities for adults and children. In 1937{Alice Clark}gave Street{Greenbank}outdoor swimming pool and later opened the{Strode}indoor swimming pool which is used by many schools in the area. There is also an outdoor bowling green for older people. In 1964 Clarks gave Street the{Strode Theatre}and the{Victoria sports club}where you can play tennis,squash,netball,cricket, football,indoor and outdoor bowls, hockey and chess.There are about two thousand members of the club.
